~pwd      =present working directory
~cd       =change directory
~cd .     = take to the root directory
~cd ..    =one step lesser than the root directory
~ls       =list all files/folder in that directory
~ls -al   =lists the current directory contents 
~
~
~
~
1~git init =initialize a empty repository
2~git status  =
3~git add   =add to git repository
~git add .   =add all files to repository
~git log    =give log of
~git commit -m "//Details"
~git commit -a -m "//Details"    = add and commit in       one move
~git log --oneline    =commits in one line
~git log --oneline --graph    =
~git remote add origin
~git push origin master
